entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h except west 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
